body: Hobgoblins are defined by their class levels—they do not possess racial Hit Dice. All hobgoblins have the following racial traits.
name: Hobgoblin

sections.body: Hobgoblins can see in the dark up to 60 feet.
sections.name: Darkvision

sections.body: Hobgoblins gain a +4 racial bonus on Stealth checks.
sections.name: Sneaky

sections.body: All hobgoblins begin play speaking Common and Goblin. Hobgoblins with high Intelligence scores can choose any of the following bonus languages: Draconic, Dwarven, Infernal, Giant, Orc.
sections.name: Languages
